name: The cabin - demo
description:
We made a custom scene using the art assets and the code from another unfinished project. The purpose of this portmortem scene is to fill our portfolio and just dont let die four months of work.

The art guy was Marc Calero (LinkedIn) from Lleida. He can move to another city ;)

And the code guy was Enric Cantalejos (GitHub.io) from Barcelona.
